name: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: New Year's Celebration
synopsis: Ni Hao! Get ready to enjoy the greatest Chinese New Year celebration ever with Kai-lan and her friends! Join in the fun with Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee, HoHo, LuLu, and YeYe as you help them craft paper lanterns, cook Chinese dumplings, march in a parade, play in a band, and much, much more!
